name: Delivery Pending
description:
Currently very incomplete - I'll be fixing this up over the next couple weeks (I am in the middle of a road trip).

A short story about somebody waiting for a package to be delivered.

This was a project I put together to try and get familiar with Godot (in particular implementing the visual novel with a mix of Mono C# and GDScript) and achieve a deeper understanding of ClipStudio's art tools.

Music Used:

  • (Zansho by Sloppy Sound) https://dova-s.jp/bgm/play17245.html
  • (Flowers at Night by Flehmann) https://dova-s.jp/bgm/play17289.html
